price: ឱអះលីគីតាប. ហេតុអី្វបានជាពួកអ្នកប្រឆាំងនឹង អាយ៉ាត់ៗរបស់អល់ឡោះ ខណៈដែលពួកអ្នកដឹងឮហើយនោះ?
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنتُمۡ تَشۡهَدُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wa-antum tashhadūna
